front.title: American National Standard Interrelationship of Quartz-Fiber Electrometer Type Exposure Meters and Companion Exposure Meter Chargers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The purpose of this standard is to specify interrelating mechanical and electrical properties so that quartz-fiber exposure meters may be used with any charger. Other characteristics peculiar to these devices but not affecting the interrelationship between chargers and exposure meters are purposely omitted.<>
